descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: To provide students with a working knowledge of the fundamentals of screenwriting with emphasis on character development and structure.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Students will write and revise an original short film screenplay (8-10 screenplay pages). Students will also be graded on reading assignments, canvas posts, discussions, and in-class workshops of student scripts.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Seger, Linda. Making A Good Script Great, (3rd Ed.) Los Angeles: Samuel French

ISBN13: 978-1935247012
ISBN10: 1935247018

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: All films will be shown in class or streamed online via CANVAS.
